General.Name: Aneka Jaringan Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Aneka Jaringan Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the foundation and basement construction businesses in Malaysia and Indonesia. The company undertakes foundation and basement construction works comprises bored piling works, such as bored piles, piles caps, and plunge-in columns; pile raft; retaining wall and basement construction; and other civil engineering works. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
